com.mygdx.game

Interface CollisionSubject

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Character, Enemy, Entity

    public interface CollisionSubject
    Interface to add and remove CollisionObserver layers and print the colliding object (upon observed collisions)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCollisionObserver(CollisionObserver collidable)
      Add a collision observer layer
      void notifyCollisionObservers()
      Print/notify when source object has collided
      void removeCollisionObserver(CollisionObserver collidable)
      Remove a collision observer layer
